text:
I hard-coded the query string including the fields in the sitemap, though it's
not the nicest solution:

<!-- {1:pub}/{2:area}/{3:queryString} -->
<map:generate type="search">
  <map:parameter name="index" value="{index-path:{1}-{2}}"/>
  <map:parameter name="query"
    value="title:{3} OR description:{3} OR subject:{3} OR body:{3}"/>
</map:generate>
